item.title: Andriel's Newsletter no. 16
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: 📰 What’s New? 🗣 All time high in terms of communication metrics. 👋🏼 Goodbye Ben. 🪜 Continuous progress on all aspects.

item.title: Andriel's Newsletter no. 15
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: 📰 What’s New? 🗣 Reciting numerics and alphabets. 🚽 Toileting updates. 🚀 Continuous improvements. ☀️ A lot of fun outside! 🏫 Therapies and Schools Therapies 🎙 Speech Therapy Andriel is expanding his vocabulary.

item.title: Andriel's Newsletter no. 14
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: 📰 What’s New? 🤗 New therapists. 🏡 Moved to a new place. 🏫 Busy with finding schools. 🚽 Toileting updates. 🗣 Speaking a lot of 1 word-ers.
